snippet: Readers including Seymour D. Reich, formerly of the Conference of Presidents of Major American Jewish Organizations, respond to a front-page article.
lead_paragraph: Readers including Seymour D. Reich, formerly of the Conference of Presidents of Major American Jewish Organizations, respond to a front-page article.

headline.print_headline: Free a Spy to Help Save the Mideast Talks?
headline.main: Free a Spy to Help Save the Mideast Talks?
